whatIs.title: What is Hailuo Image to Video?
whatIs.description: Hailuo Image to Video (by MiniMax) is a cutting-edge AI video generator that transforms static images into dynamic 6-10 second video clips with cinematic quality. Renowned for its superior motion synthesis and 1080p output, it excels at preserving facial expressions, adding natural camera movements, and creating seamless transitions. Our Hailuo Image to Video tool leverages MiniMax's advanced Video-01 algorithms‚Äîoptimized for photographs, digital art, and illustrations‚Äîto animate your visuals with professional-grade results. Experience lightning-fast generation (under 90 seconds), exceptional visual consistency, and intuitive creative control over every animated sequence.

examples.title: Hailuo Image to Video Examples

howToUse.title: How to use Hailuo Image to Video

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Select the photo, illustration, or artwork you want to animate. Hailuo supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 10 MB.

steps.title: Add Your Animation Prompt
steps.content: Describe the motion you want‚Äîcamera zoom, pan, character movement, or ambient effects. Provide details like speed, direction, or mood for best results.

steps.title: Generate Your Video
steps.content: Click ‚ÄúAnimate‚Äù and let the AI image-to-video algorithm create a smooth video. Preview your clip and adjust any settings as needed.

steps.title: Download & Share
steps.content: Save your high-resolution video file and share it on social media, embed in your projects, or use it for marketing campaigns.

benefits.title: Why Use Hailuo Image to Video?
benefits.description: Discover the advantages of using our AI image animation tool to convert still images into engaging video content.

features.title: Seamless Image Animation
features.content: Turn any static image into a dynamic video with AI-driven motion effects‚Äîno manual keyframing required.

features.title: AI-Powered Converter
features.content: Harness state-of-the-art neural networks trained on millions of frames to generate realistic animations automatically.

features.title: User-Friendly Workflow
features.content: No technical or animation skills needed‚Äîjust upload, describe the effect, and click to create your video.

features.title: Fast Turnaround
features.content: Generate high-quality video clips in seconds, speeding up content creation and reducing production time.

features.title: Versatile Output
features.content: Export videos in HD formats ready for social media, websites, presentations, and more.

features.title: Boost Engagement
features.content: Capture attention with moving visuals that outperform static images on social feeds and marketing materials.

faq.title: Hailuo Image to Video FAQ
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about using Hailuo Image to Video for seamless image animation.
faq.q1: What formats does Hailuo Image to Video support?
faq.a1: Hailuo accepts common image formats like JPG, PNG, and WebP. For best results, use high-resolution images with clear details.
faq.q2: How long does it take to generate a video?
faq.a2: Most videos are ready within 5‚Äì10 seconds, thanks to optimized AI processing and cloud servers.
faq.q3: Can I customize the animation style?
faq.a3: Yes. You can specify camera moves (pan, zoom, tilt), motion speed, and effects like 3D parallax or subtle character motions.
faq.a4: No. Hailuo‚Äôs intuitive interface and AI algorithms make video creation accessible to everyone, from beginners to professionals.
faq.a5: All videos you create with Hailuo are cleared for personal and commercial use under our terms of service.
faq.q6: Can I animate multiple images in one project?
faq.a6: Absolutely. Upload a series of images to create a multi-scene video or a storyboard animation.
faq.q7: Is there a size limit for uploads?
faq.a7: Each image must be under 10 MB. For larger projects, optimize your files or split them into smaller batches.
faq.a8: Simply click ‚ÄúUpload,‚Äù select your image, add a prompt, and hit ‚ÄúAnimate.‚Äù It‚Äôs that easy!

examples.title: Model: Hailuo

examples.title: Model: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: A blue furry creature in the scene is constantly stirring a steaming pot of soup. Then, the blue creature blows on the pot, causing the soup in the bowl in front of it to freeze into a block of ice.

examples.title: Model: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: In the scene, a small dog emits a blue light from its eyes. The messy clothes in front of the dog also begin to glow blue and slowly float into the air, folding neatly on their own before landing in front of the dog. Afterward, the blue light in the dog's eyes fades away.

examples.title: Model: Hailuo
examples.description: Prompt: A cat in the scene runs quickly toward the camera, with white electric sparks emanating from its eyes. Its entire body becomes surrounded by electricity as it runs faster and faster. The scenery on both sides rushes backward rapidly, creating motion blur that transforms into a glowing white time tunnel.
